title: Don't Peek
description: These are the real-life teenage diaries of Marita A. Hansen written between 1988 and 1993, where boys, sport, boys, and family, and boys are her major priorities, and did I mention boys? You will either cringe or laugh out loud as she blunders her way through multiple crushes in her final years of high school. And when she finally gets the boy, she continues to blunder.So, have a peek into the mind of this 'adorkable' teenage girl before the woman she has grown into realises she's made a mistake publishing her diaries.
author: Marita A. Hansen
